metadata.name: [F9] Run Tracker
metadata.description:
[h1][b]Run Tracker[/b][/h1]
[h2][b]Introduction[/b][/h2]
Run Tracker is a mod to that allows to track general and specific data of every standard character.
[h2][b]Installing[/b][/h2]
Click on the "Subscribe" button, which will cause Steam to automatically download the mod when you open the game.
[h2][b]Usage[/b][/h2]
Press F9 in game to open the statistics menu and change settings.
Source code: https://github.com/AgeOfWar/RunTracker
